comment: Hunt is an average professor. There is a lot of homework, for which is outrageous. But, I understand that he doesnt make that call. Hes not the best, but not the worst.

Professor Hunt is hands down one of THE BEST professors in the SOM. He does have a lot of assignments, but from what Ive heard, no matter who you take the syllabus(I.e. the assignments) are the same. He is so caring and understanding and gives numerous opportunities to help improve your grade. He also offers tutoring outside of class!! Take him!!

He was the best teacher ever. He was super accommodating and he actually cared about my success! He is definitely better than the other professors! There is no reason he shouldnt have a 5 point rating!!!!!!! TAKE HIM PLEASEEEEE

HW due at the end of class days: sight reading or dictation, so about 31 assignments, 1-3 sight reading tests (multiple attempts if you do poor on first few), and 3-4 exams. Class grade depends on your own effort to study. Not helpful in class when teaching (he has tutoring on the side, though). Good person, but not the best music teacher.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Lots of homework--Clear grading criteria

comment: Overall I really enjoyed taking this course. He makes everything very clear and understandable and wants you to do well. He goes above and beyond and is happy to meet with you outside of class for extra help. I recommend taking this course for aural skills!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Participation matters
